name: ECLIPSE (itch) (Narwhalnut)
description:
ECLIPSE is a miniature puzzle platformer where you control the orbit of the moon!

Once, the Sun, Moon, and Stars all lived in harmony. The Sun eventually grew jealous of the night sky's beauty and took revenge on the Moon and Stars. Now with an atmosphere of permanent daylight, it is the Earth's job to return balance. Collect all of the fallen Stars with the help of the Moon and return night to the sky!

Controls:

  • W - Swipe Moon Upwards
  • A - Move Earth Left
  • S- Swipe Moon Downwards
  • D - Move Earth Right
  • SHIFT - Perform Orbit Attack
  • SPACE - Jump
  • ESC - Pause

This game was created for LOWREZJAM 2022.

Theme Used: The Sun is Your Enemy
